scripts.compile:all: pnpm compile:fa2:all && pnpm compile:hook:all && pnpm compile:mint-recipe
scripts.compile:contract: pnpm --silent ligo compile contract src/${CONTRACT}/main.ligo --deprecated -e main --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/${CONTRACT}.tz
scripts.compile:contract:using-consts: pnpm --silent ligo:0.60.0 compile contract src/${CONTRACT}/main-using-constants.ligo -e main_using_constants --file-constants ./build/constants/all.json > ./build/contracts/${CONTRACT}-using-constants.tz
scripts.compile:fa2:all: pnpm compile:fa2 && pnpm compile:fa2-protocol && pnpm compile:fa2:using-consts && pnpm compile:fa2-protocol:using-consts
scripts.compile:const:fa2:json: pnpm --silent ligo:0.60.0 compile expression --michelson-format json --init-file src/fa2/main.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_') > ./build/constants/fa2/${CONST}.json
scripts.compile:const:fa2:raw: pnpm --silent ligo:0.60.0 compile constant --init-file src/fa2/main.ligo pascaligo $(echo $CONST | tr '-' '_')
scripts.transpile:core:fa2: pnpm --silent ligo transpile contract src/core-protocol/fa2/main.ligo -o src/core-protocol/fa2/main.jsligo
